items.title: Today’s Job Hunt is a Brutal Slog. Here’s How That Could Affect Your Hiring Process
items.description: As fewer jobs are being created, competition for each open role is stepping up. The application process can be hugely frustrating.

items.title: Microweddings Are In. Here’s How They’re Forcing the Wedding Industry to Adapt
items.description: Creativity and flexibility are essential traits right now, wedding industry founders say.

items.title: 7 Tips on Outlasting Your Competition, From Serial Entrepreneur Jesse Itzler
items.description: In both business and life, endurance, not speed, is of the utmost imporance.

items.title: Climate Change Is Supercharging the Case for More Seasonal Work
items.description: Extreme weather makes it even clearer than our energy levels vary throughout the year. Is making work more seasonal the solution?

items.title: This Is Why Employees Quit
items.description: Employees need to feel like they matter.
